rule-23-1-a.test_description: Building has System type 7 and space type is Laboratory.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: System 2 and 4 - Electric air-source heat pumps shall be modeled with electric auxiliary heat and an outdoor air thermostat. The systems shall be controlled to energize auxiliary heat only when the outdoor air temperature is less than 40°F. The air-source heat pump shall be modeled to continue to operate while auxiliary heat is energized.

rule-23-1-b.test_description: Building has System type 7 and there are no laboratory spaces.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: System 2 and 4 - Electric air-source heat pumps shall be modeled with electric auxiliary heat and an outdoor air thermostat. The systems shall be controlled to energize auxiliary heat only when the outdoor air temperature is less than 40°F. The air-source heat pump shall be modeled to continue to operate while auxiliary heat is energized.

rule-23-4-a.test_description: Building has System type 5 and space type is Laboratory.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: Baseline systems 5 & 7 serving lab spaces per G3.1.1c shall reduce lab exhaust and makeup air during unoccupied periods to 50% of zone peak airflow, the minimum outdoor airflow, or rate required to comply with minimum accreditation standards whichever is larger.
standard.rule_dependency: System 5, 7 (Rule18-a, to be confirmed), lab space

rule-23-4-b.test_description: Building has System type 7 and there are no laboratory spaces.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: Baseline systems 5 & 7 serving lab spaces per G3.1.1c shall reduce lab exhaust and makeup air during unoccupied periods to 50% of zone peak airflow, the minimum outdoor airflow, or rate required to comply with minimum accreditation standards whichever is larger.
standard.rule_dependency: System 5, 7 (Rule18-a, to be confirmed), lab space

rule-23-4-a.1.test_description: Building has System type 6.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: Baseline systems 5 & 7 serving lab spaces per G3.1.1c shall reduce lab exhaust and makeup air during unoccupied periods to 50% of zone peak airflow, the minimum outdoor airflow, or rate required to comply with minimum accreditation standards whichever is larger.
standard.rule_dependency: System 5, 7 (Rule18-a, to be confirmed), lab space

rule-23-5-b.test_description: Building has System type 4.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: For baseline systems 6 and 8, Fans in parallel VAV fan-powered boxes shall run as the first stage of heating before the reheat coil is energized.

rule-23-5-a.test_description: Building has System type 11.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: For baseline systems 6 and 8, Fans in parallel VAV fan-powered boxes shall run as the first stage of heating before the reheat coil is energized.

rule-23-9-b.test_description: Building has System type 10.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: System 11 Minimum volume setpoint shall be the largest of 50% of the maximum design airflow rate, the minimum ventilation airflow rate or the airflow required to comply with codes or accredidation standards.

rule-23-10-a.test_description: Building has System type 11.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: System 11 Fan volume shall be reset from 100% airflow at 100% load to minimum airflow at 50% load.

rule-23-10-b.test_description: Building has System type 8.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: System 11 Fan volume shall be reset from 100% airflow at 100% load to minimum airflow at 50% load.

rule-23-11-a.test_description: Building has System type 11.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: System 11 Supply air temperature shall be reset from minimum supply air temp at 50% cooling load to room temp at 0% cooling load.

rule-23-11-b.test_description: Building has System type 3.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: System 11 Supply air temperature shall be reset from minimum supply air temp at 50% cooling load to room temp at 0% cooling load.

rule-23-12-a.test_description: Building has System type 11.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: System 11 in heating mode SAT shall be modulated to maintain space temp and airflow shall be fixed at minimum airflow.

rule-23-12-b.test_description: Building has System type 2.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: System 11 in heating mode SAT shall be modulated to maintain space temp and airflow shall be fixed at minimum airflow.

rule-23-13-a.test_description: Building has System type 11.  Proposed building has humidification.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: If proposed design includes humidistatic controls then the baseline shall use mechanical cooling for dehumidification and shall reheat to avoid overcooling.

rule-23-13-b.test_description: Building has System type 2.  Proposed building does not have humidification.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: If proposed design includes humidistatic controls then the baseline shall use mechanical cooling for dehumidification and shall reheat to avoid overcooling.

rule-23-13-a.1.test_description: Building has System type 7.  Proposed building has dehumidification.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: If proposed design includes humidistatic controls then the baseline shall use mechanical cooling for dehumidification and shall reheat to avoid overcooling.

rule-23-13-b.1.test_description: Building has System type 7.  Proposed building does not have humidification.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: If proposed design includes humidistatic controls then the baseline shall use mechanical cooling for dehumidification and shall reheat to avoid overcooling.

rule-23-15-a.test_description: Building has System type 7.  Proposed building has dehumidification.  Expected result: applicable

standard.rule_description: Dehumidification reheat shall be the same as the system heating type.

rule-23-15-b.test_description: Building has System type 7.  Proposed building does not have humidification.  Expected result: not applicable

standard.rule_description: Dehumidification reheat shall be the same as the system heating type.
